title: "MosaicPlotLab"
output: html_notebook

Working example:
```{r}
ggplot(data = flights) +
    geom_mosaic(aes(x = product(do_you_recline, rude_to_recline), fill = do_you_recline)) 
```

Adapt to data:

```{r}

tmp <- Comp_ROC(ds_Q, "group", "SD_ID_ysc","ID","moreSyn")

ds_Q %>%
    mutate(test_out = SD_ID_ysc > tmp$ROC_properties$threshold) %>%
    ggplot() +
    geom_mosaic(aes(x = product(test_out, group), fill = test_out)) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("#66C2A5","#FC8D62")) +
    geom_mosaic_text(aes(x = product(test_out, group), label = after_stat(.wt))) +
    theme_minimal()
  # geom_mosaic_text(aes(x = product(group), fill = test_out))

```
